#Changes made between successive versions of OGMS


= OGMSv0.2-v0.3 Changelog =

* OBO file: Added dbxrefs to the issue tracker for traceability
* OBO and OWL files: Added 'obsolete_' prefix to obsoleted terms
* [http://code.google.com/p/ogms/issues/detail?id=4 Issue 4] closed without change
* [http://code.google.com/p/ogms/issues/detail?id=5 Issue 5] closed without change
* [http://code.google.com/p/ogms/issues/detail?id=6 Issue 6] closed opened issue 37 to clairfy
* [http://code.google.com/p/ogms/issues/detail?id=8 Issue 8] closed, modified 'preclinical manifestation' (OGMS:0000026)
* [http://code.google.com/p/ogms/issues/detail?id=9 Issue 9] closed without change
* [http://code.google.com/p/ogms/issues/detail?id=10 Issue 10] closed without change
* [http://code.google.com/p/ogms/issues/detail?id=13 Issue 13] left open, added term pain (OGMS:0000085) without definition
* [http://code.google.com/p/ogms/issues/detail?id=16 Issue 16] closed, duplicate issue of issue 12
* [http://code.google.com/p/ogms/issues/detail?id=18 Issue 18] left open, changed definition of clinical picture (OGMS:0000016)
* [http://code.google.com/p/ogms/issues/detail?id=19 Issue 19] closed, changed definition of phenotype (OGMS:0000023)
* [http://code.google.com/p/ogms/issues/detail?id=22 Issue 22] closed, obsoleted (OGMS:0000068) bodily feature and moved its elucidation to defined class 'bodily feature of a patient', obsoleted (OGMS:0000072) OGMSdisposition
[http://code.google.com/p/ogms/issues/detail?id=26 Issue 26], left open for further work, 
 * reclassified clinical history (OGMS:0000018) from representation (OGMS:0000013) to clinical finding (OGMS:0000014) 
 * reclassified laboratory finding (OGMS:0000018) from representation (OGMS:0000013) to clinical finding (OGMS:0000014) 
 * reclassified image finding (OGMS:0000018) from representation (OGMS:0000013) to clinical finding (OGMS:0000014)
 * added new term (OGMS:0000083) physical examination finding under clinical finding (OGMS:0000014)
* [http://code.google.com/p/ogms/issues/detail?id=27 Issue 27], closed, obsoleted IDO terms and ids from OGMS.
* [http://code.google.com/p/ogms/issues/detail?id=32 Issue 32], left open, added term syndrome (OGMS:0000086)
* [http://code.google.com/p/ogms/issues/detail?id=33 Issue 33], closed added term organism population (OGMS:0000084)
* [http://code.google.com/p/ogms/issues/detail?id=34 Issue 34], closed changed definition of disease (OGMS:0000031)
* New Issue [http://code.google.com/p/ogms/issues/detail?id=37 37] created
* New Issue [http://code.google.com/p/ogms/issues/detail?id=38 38] created
